name: Coffee Tower
description:
The business tower has ran out of coffee! As the coffee man, you must refresh them before the situation gets worse.  There are three levels of increasing difficulty and then a boss.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Move
  • Click - Thrown coffee
  • R - Restart
  • M - Mute music

Go into fullscreen to prevent scrolling the page

Made in construct 3 for a school project
